overview: An attempt to cut and create an alternative narrative using excerpts from a giant box of old American public information films* (which can be found at archive.org), using original audio with all video clips in the rather lengthy editing process, as a self imposed creative restriction.  *There appear to be some clips from a couple of old British movies in amongst the archive.org footage. Notably The Green Man, but also the Ladykillers and possibly others...
title: Grist To The Mill
